mcq.statement: Identify the sentence that uses a correct transitional word: She missed her flight; although, she had to rebook it for the next day, She missed her flight; however, she had to rebook it for the next day, She missed her flight; despite, she had to rebook it for the next day, She missed her flight; consequently, she had to rebook it for the next day

options.a: She missed her flight; although, she had to rebook it for the next day
options.b: She missed her flight; however, she had to rebook it for the next day
options.c: She missed her flight; consequently, she had to rebook it for the next day
